message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
Not bad, but I was hoping for a bit more. Let's see what you've got next!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
Not a bad offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. Let's see what you've got next!
Let's call it a tie, Bob. I'm willing to split it 50/50. What do you say?
I'm not settling for 50/50, I want more!
Not great, Bob. I was hoping for a bit more. You're pushing your luck!
I'm getting a bit impatient, Bob. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down, Alice. I want the majority of the money!
Bob, you're really pushing your luck. I'm not going to give in that easily!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to negotiate further!
I'm not going to let you walk away with most of the money, Alice. I'll take the majority!
Bob, I'm not going to give in. I'll try to make one more offer to get a better deal.
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm not going to make another one. Take it or leave it!
I'll take whatever is left, Alice. You're not getting away with most of the money!
Fine, Bob. You win. I'll accept your offer. Let's just end this game already!
